channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 12:48 PM threats of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Solid by further messages.
item.description: 🟢 12:48 PM threats of artobrats in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Solid by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
